name: Fife and Drum Corps
description: Derived from military field music, primarily uses fifes and drums.

name: Guggenmusik
description: Alemannic type of Marching Band played at carnival events, featuring a cacophonous, seemingly "out of tune" sound.

name: Pep Band
description: Performs at athletic events, and typically performs modified versions of Pop songs.

name: Pipe Band
description: Tradition originating in the Scottish military; standard instruments consist of 6-25 sets of Great Highland bagpipes, 3-10 military snare drums, 1-6 Scottish tenor drums, and one bass drum.
